properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 1:18PM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...NW winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt expected.

* WHERE...Long Island Sound, New York Harbor, and the bays of Long
Island.

* WHEN...From noon to 7 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will most likely be near
shore.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY
